Package shapeDriver

Class FunctionsManagement

java.lang.Object
shapeDriver.FunctionsManagement
public class FunctionsManagement extends Object
This class is responsible to handle with all background interaction as: read the file, create array, select comparison method and define sort method.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FunctionsManagement(String filePath)
    Main method calling all classes and methods involved in get the user's information and be able to sort defined shapes.

  • Constructor Details

    • FunctionsManagement

      public FunctionsManagement(String filePath) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, ComparisonTypeException, SortingTypeException, BreakpointTypeException, FileNotFoundException
      Main method calling all classes and methods involved in get the user's information and be able to sort defined shapes.
      Parameters:
      filePath - String from the path of file defined by user.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - thrown when an the class is not founded.
      NoSuchMethodException - thrown when an the method is not founded.
      InstantiationException - thrown when an the the class had a problem to instance.
      IllegalAccessException - thrown when has some problem to reflect the class.
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown when an illegal argument is trying to be used into a method.
      ComparisonTypeException - thrown when the comparison criteria is not founded.
      SortingTypeException - thrown when the sorting type is not founded.
      BreakpointTypeException - thrown when the breakpoint criteria is not founded.
      FileNotFoundException - thrown when the file is not founded.
      InvocationTargetException

  • Method Details

    • sorting

      public static void sorting(Shape[] shape, String sortingCriteria, String comparisionCriteria, String selectedCriteria) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, ComparisonTypeException
      Parameters:
      shape - Array containing shapes information.
      sortingCriteria - Sorting criteria defined by user.
      comparisionCriteria - Comparison criteria defined by user.
      selectedCriteria - Text including the comparison criteria select by user.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - thrown when has some problem to reflect the class.
      InvocationTargetException - checks if some exception was thrown when invokes method or constructor.
      ComparisonTypeException - thrown when the comparison criteria is not founded.
